title: (x) North America Corp. - Gill Sans {Fabio}
content: Anyone know this easy one? ![North America Corp](http://web.archive.org/web/20120102172153im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/18634.jpg)
author: silly

comments.content:
Gill Sans   
Bold Italic!   
   
See here:   
http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/gill-sans/bold-italic/testdrive.html?s=NORT+AMERICAN&p=96
The "C" is a little different and the "M" does not come to a point in the middle at the bottom. I used Gill Sans last time and now the customer has come back and said the font is wrong...Help!
yep, I think the bold italic will work. Thanks Fabio.
